question: Who launched the launched a video of the National Anthem in sign language recently?
explanation: Union minister Mahendra Nath Pandey launched a video of the National Anthem in sign language and addressed the physically challenged as "divyang" and not "viklang" to ensure there was no distinction. The 3.35-minute video, directed by Govind Nihalani, stars Bollywood star Amitabh Bachchan, along with physically challenged children performing the anthem in sign language, with the Red Fort in the background.
